cause.description:
so, pretty much, leslie's stuck in maryland, and we're trying to save money to bring her home. if you have a few dollars you could help us out with, that would be awesome. call me, and let me know if you want to help out. 309-2538 every little bit helps, and your donations will be greatly appreciated.
1. leslie belongs in kansas city
2. everyone she loves is here
3. maryland sucks.
cause.name: leslie needs to get home a.s.a.p.
